impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FIDIPI - Fined and detained in default of payment in police station
To be detained in police station until 10:00. Total amount enforced: £200.00
FO - Fine
Fined £100.00
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £50.00
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 11/04/2025.
